duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a cross-functional learning curriculum to strengthen HR skills and contribute to the success of the organization.
Lead HR and analytics projects to streamline processes and increase working capital turns.
Provide support in enabling the HR operating model and participate in activities related to HR transformation and Workday implementation.
Plan, manage, and provide deliverables on projects as assigned throughout rotational assignments.
Identify opportunities for improvement and make constructive suggestions for change.
Facilitate structured training programs to support business transformation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Human Resources, Analytics, or Communications (Master's preferred)
